br.com.caelum.vraptor.util.hibernate.extra
Annotation Type Load

@Target(value=PARAMETER)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Load

To annotate parameters to be loaded before the controller is executed

Since:
3.4.0
Author:
Lucas Cavalcanti
